title: Move PCs with ease with 80% off three top PC transfer tools
description:
You’re not going to use just one PC for your whole life. You never know when you might find a great deal on a new one, and you never know when your current tool might slow down to the point of feeling borderline unusable.

When it’s time for an upgrade, you don’t just want to start from scratch with your new PC. You want to bring everything over from your old one. This PC Transfer Kit Bundle makes it easier than ever to migrate between an old and new PC, and for a limited time, you can get it for 80% off when you use promo code TRANSFER30.

This bundle includes non-expiring licenses to PCmover Professional, DiskImage, and SafeErase, three top-rated tools to facilitate one PC transfer. PCmover Professional has earned 4.0/5 stars on more than 2,000 Amazon reviews, and will automatically move applications, files, settings, and even user profiles from an old PC to a new one, or an old operating system to a new one. DiskImage creates a perfect copy of your drive for extra security when making the move, while SafeImage securely deletes Internet browser data, files, partitions, and even entire hard drives when you’re done.

Simplify your next PC migration. Between 4/5 and 11:59 pm on 4/11, you can get this PC Transfer Kit Bundle for just $25.49 (reg. $129) when you use promo code TRANSFER30.

 

PC Transfer Kit Bundle feat. PCmover Professional, DiskImage, and SafeErase – $34.99

See Deal
